content: japanese name サーモンピンクのキャミソール *salmon pink camisole* for help using the tezukuritown website please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group **tools/materials ** * japanese size 4/0 & 6/0 crochet hook 2 5 & 3 5mm * 40cm of elastic to be crocheted into the bottom hem called ゴムカタン *gomukatan* in japanese
